chunks.text:
Make preventative care your priority in 2025 
If you are having trouble viewing this email view online <https://url.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com/s/Vr4JCYlOPU6ynoncGhxUxYB3n?domain=app2.comms.cigna.com> 	  	  <https://image2.comms.cigna.com/EloquaImages/clients/CignaGHBIntl/%7Bb0866b45-7b1a-4c0e-a929-c9cd7c591ed5%7D_cignahlthcr_logo_color_pos_rgb.png> 
 <https://image2.comms.cigna.com/EloquaImages/clients/CignaGHBIntl/%7B3303256f-b00c-4698-a011-beae8a8acb3a%7D_cignahlthcr_logo_color_rev_rgb.png> 
 <https://image2.comms.cigna.com/EloquaImages/clients/CignaGHBIntl/%7B9820a587-2c5a-44ad-b6e2-8b6241376b57%7D_im1441_email_header.png> 	

Your health, anytime, anywhere. 

Good health is about having the right support at the right time, wherever you are. That’s why, as a SmartCare member, you have access to digital health care solutions that put you in control of your well-being. 

 <https://image2.comms.cigna.com/EloquaImages/clients/CignaGHBIntl/%7B7a63b1bd-724c-4ffc-903f-df9413831747%7D_dark-blue-bottom-curve-2.png> 	

24/7 virtual care with Telehealth through SmartCare by Cigna app. 

 <https://image2.comms.cigna.com/EloquaImages/clients/CignaGHBIntl/%7Bb64c5ce1-73d4-4592-9493-9ca05bcf0f34%7D_doctor.png> 	 	 Instant access to preferred doctors, anytime, anywhere because health concerns don’t wait for office hours. 

 	 
 <https://image2.comms.cigna.com/EloquaImages/clients/CignaGHBIntl/%7B150244cc-6403-4b85-800c-8d9830693f8e%7D_prescriptions.png> 	 	 Get prescriptions, medical advice, and referrals within minutes because fast action leads to better health outcomes.

chunks.text:
<https://image2.comms.cigna.com/EloquaImages/clients/CignaGHBIntl/%7B150244cc-6403-4b85-800c-8d9830693f8e%7D_prescriptions.png> 	 	 Get prescriptions, medical advice, and referrals within minutes because fast action leads to better health outcomes. 

 	 
 <https://image2.comms.cigna.com/EloquaImages/clients/CignaGHBIntl/%7Bd778a152-878f-426d-808e-66e205ab0b5a%7D_skip_the_line.png> 	 	 Skip the clinic lines and consultations delays, speak to a licensed healthcare professional from the comfort of your home or office. 

 <https://image2.comms.cigna.com/EloquaImages/clients/CignaGHBIntl/%7Bee2948b4-fdf7-4a3a-a7a8-d1ea36746325%7D_dark-blue-top-curve-2.png> 	

Exclusive access to expert health insights. 

As a member, you also have access to expert-led resources designed to empower your well‑being: 

 <https://image2.comms.cigna.com/EloquaImages/clients/CignaGHBIntl/%7B92b521ef-5db2-4367-b265-f363c5192320%7D_videocall_blue_icon.png> 	

ConnectForHealth 

Monthly webinar series hosted by medical specialists and industry experts, covering diverse topics such as parenting, chronic condition management, preventative care, financial well-being, and much more. 

Click here <https://url.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com/s/Chr6CZmPQtoWknksKioUBCOJs?domain=app2.comms.cigna.com> 	
 	  <https://image2.comms.cigna.com/EloquaImages/clients/CignaGHBIntl/%7Beb2e5ae8-8824-4741-8abb-e22354b6e4d6%7D_laptop_blue_icon.png> 	

Thought Leadership hub 

Gain insights from global reports, regional studies and articles on key factors shaping your health and vitality.

Click here <https://url.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com/s/Chr6CZmPQtoWknksKioUBCOJs?domain=app2.comms.cigna.com> 	
 	  <https://image2.comms.cigna.com/EloquaImages/clients/CignaGHBIntl/%7Beb2e5ae8-8824-4741-8abb-e22354b6e4d6%7D_laptop_blue_icon.png> 	

Thought Leadership hub 

Gain insights from global reports, regional studies and articles on key factors shaping your health and vitality. 

Click here <https://url.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com/s/fZvtC1BKACEQPwPsXsNUVhyMH?domain=app2.comms.cigna.com> 	
Stay informed, stay proactive and take control of your health with insights and tools designed to empower you. 

 <https://image2.comms.cigna.com/EloquaImages/clients/CignaGHBIntl/%7B1b8945fb-4ce3-4a1a-9a94-4916b80895fd%7D_dark-green-bottom-curve-2.png> 	

Dubai Health Authority brings you the Hepatitis <https://url.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com/s/aghmC21LBTEDBoBs9tYU5aYFi?domain=image2.comms.cigna.com>  and Cancer (BASMAH) <https://url.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com/s/ovuHC3KMDuRryYySvuGUQ1ErB?domain=image2.comms.cigna.com>  Patient Support Program. 


The BASMAH program is available for insured LSB members (with a monthly salary of AED 4,000 or less) holding a residence visa issued from Dubai with validity of not less than one year. 

 <https://image2.comms.cigna.com/EloquaImages/clients/CignaGHBIntl/%7B573fa43c-a7bd-4eae-91e4-28867d84906b%7D_medical_form_blue.png> 	 	 What’s included? 

*	Screenings and treatment for Cervical, Breast, and Colorectal (Bowel) Cancer 
*	Screenings and treatment for Hepatitis B & C 
*	Cigna Healthcare fully funds the cost of treatment for eligible beneficiaries.

For more details on your benefits or assistance, contact us at 800 762 82273 <https://url.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com/s/KjKzC6zPJSG4plpF9HLU5rhg_?domain=app2.comms.cigna.com>  or email us at Smartcare.support@neuron.ae <mailto:Smartcare.support@neuron.ae> . 

Stay proactive about your health! 

Warmest Regards,
Cigna Healthcare
